attributes.action: Do what you promised - give us a referendum on the EU treaty (Constitution)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I and ALL of the people I have spoken to want a referendum on the EU Treaty which is 96% identical to the rejected Constitution. Labour promised this to us and we want our say! This will have an inreversible major impact on our country and the government has been elected to act for the British people - this does not include going behind our backs. Please give us our say. What are you frightened of?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
